methods.name: public static void scrollTo(TextView widget, Layout layout, int x, int y)
methods.comment:
* Scrolls the specified widget to the specified coordinates, except
     * constrains the X scrolling position to the horizontal regions of
     * the text that will be visible after scrolling to the specified
     * Y position.

methods.name: public static boolean onTouchEvent(TextView widget, Spannable buffer, MotionEvent event)
methods.comment:
* Handles touch events for dragging.  You may want to do other actions
     * like moving the cursor on touch as well.

methods.name: public static int getInitialScrollX(TextView widget, Spannable buffer)
methods.comment:
* @param widget The text view.
     * @param buffer The text buffer.

methods.name: public static int getInitialScrollY(TextView widget, Spannable buffer)
methods.comment:
* @param widget The text view.
     * @param buffer The text buffer.

methodNames: public static void scrollTo(TextView widget, Layout layout, int x, int y)
public static boolean onTouchEvent(TextView widget, Spannable buffer, MotionEvent event)
public static int getInitialScrollX(TextView widget, Spannable buffer)
